00019 package org.bn.mq;
00020 
00021 import java.util.HashMap;
00022 import java.util.Map;
00023 
00024 import org.bn.mq.impl.InMemoryStorage;
00025 import org.bn.mq.impl.MessagingBus;
00026 import org.bn.mq.impl.NullStorage;
00027 import org.bn.mq.impl.PriorityQueue;
00028 import org.bn.mq.impl.Queue;
00029 import org.bn.mq.impl.SQLStorage;
00030 
00034 public class MQFactory {
00035     private static MQFactory instance = new MQFactory();
00036         
00037     protected MQFactory() {
00038     }    
00039     
00044     public static MQFactory getInstance() {
00045         return instance;
00046     }
00047     
00052     public IMessagingBus createMessagingBus() {
00053         return new MessagingBus();
00054     }
00055     
00061     public <T> IQueue<T> createQueue(Class<T> messageClass) {
00062         return createQueue("simple",messageClass);
00063     }
00064 
00071     public <T> IQueue<T> createQueue(String algorithm, Class<T> messageClass) {
00072         if(algorithm == null || (algorithm!=null && algorithm.equalsIgnoreCase("simple"))) {
00073             return new Queue<T>();
00074         }
00075         else
00076         if(algorithm.equalsIgnoreCase("priority")) {
00077             return new PriorityQueue<T>();
00078         }
00079         else
00080             return null;
00081     }
00082     
00090     public <T> IPersistenceStorage<T> createPersistenceStorage(String storageType, Map<String,Object> storageProperties, Class<T> messageClass) throws Exception {
00091         if(storageType == null || (storageType!=null && storageType.length() == 0)) {
00092             return new NullStorage<T>(storageProperties);
00093         }
00094         else
00095         if(storageType.equalsIgnoreCase("InMemory")) {
00096             return new InMemoryStorage<T>(storageProperties);
00097         }
00098         else
00099         if(storageType.equalsIgnoreCase("SQL")) {
00100             return new SQLStorage<T>(storageProperties);
00101         }
00102         else
00103             return null;
00104     }
00105 }
